definitions.definition: The theory that mankind originated with a single ancestor or ancestral couple.
The theory that all languages , or a particular set of languages, originated from a single source.
Development of the ovum from a parent like itself.

subdefinitions.definition: Asexual/nonsexual reproduction , which involves only one parent.

definitions.definition: The emergence from a single cause or origin .

main_definition: ( anthropology ) The theory that mankind originated with a single ancestor or ancestral couple.
secondary_definitions: ( linguistics ) The theory that all languages , or a particular set of languages, originated from a single source.
( biology , medicine ) Development of the ovum from a parent like itself.
The emergence from a single cause or origin .
